name: Sushi Roll Kitchen Challenge
description:
Do you like playing games that make you want to try and try until you master them? Of course you do! Everyone likes to be challenged! A challenge is what you'll get when you play this game–and the fun never stops!

Don't make a mountain out of a molehill–that's what you've probably always learned, right? Well, now you're facing a hill that really does feel like a mountain. You must move against gravity as you travel the ball up, up, up until you've reached the top!

Tilting your device, the object of the game is to move the sushi roll. But it's not easy going up when gravity wants to push you back down! Of course, there are always going to be things in your way that want to push you back to the bottom. Try to ignore these obstacles and push on!

A combination of vibrant graphics, fun sound effects, and physics is what makes this game exciting and stimulating. Try it today and master it with style!

Features:
* Great for all ages
* Amazing graphics
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Addictive Gaming

Download right now!
